en: Thus, Ugandans should not ask what Obama and Clinton have done to castrate the African terrorists.

en: Various churches in Kampala have suspended overnight prayers following the July 11 deadly bombings.

mt0: Bishop David Kiganda, chairman of the National Fellowship of Born-Again Churches, was speaking during a meeting with Kampala Capital City officials. Bishop Kiganda recently said metal detectors would be placed at church entrances.

en: The measures follow a directive by Kampala City Council that restricts churches, bars and nightclubs from staying open past ten.

en: Henry Luke Orombi, the Archbishop of the Church of Uganda, called for tighter security on July fourteen at places of worship.
lug: Ssaabalabirizi w'Ekkanisa ya Uganda Henry Luke Orombi yasabye obukuumi obw'amaanyi mu masinzizo nga kkumi na nnya Ogwomusanvu.
mt0: Henry Luke Orombi, Archbishop of the Church of Uganda, yagambye nti abantu baabwe baagomba kutegwa n'amagezi mingi mu July 14.

en: Henry Luke Orombi said that places of worship need tighter security because they can be targeted by terrorists.

en: Orombi was leading a special service at All Saints Cathedral Nakaero to remember the dead.

mt0: Orombi alikuwa akitunga mwambo mkubwa katika kanisa la All Saints Cathedral Nakaero kukumbuka wafu.

en: Following Orombi's call, security was tight on Sunday at various city churches, including Rubaga, Namirembe and All Saints cathedral.

en: In late November 2009, Ronald Mukasa, fell ill after he stepped on a needle while looking for plastic bottles and scrap metal in a rubbish dump.
lug: Mu Museenene wa 2009 ng'aggwaako, Ronald Mukasa yalwala oluvannyuma lw'okulinnya ku mpiso bwe yali anoonya obucupa bwa pulasitiika n'ebyuma ebikadde mu kasasiro.
mt0: In late November 2009, Ronald Mukasa, fell ill after he stepped on a needle while looking for plastic bottles and scrap metal in a rubbish dump.

en: Mulago Hospital is a shining example of how medical waste disposal is supposed to work.
lug: Eddwaliro ly'e Mulago kyakulabirako ekirungi ku ngeri enkwata ya kasasiro w'eddwaliro gy'erina okuba.
mt0: Mulago Hospital ni mfano mmoja shining of how medical waste disposal is supposed to work.

en: With three incinerators, Mulago boasts an organised and elaborately systematic method of medical waste management.
lug: N'ebyuma bisatu ebyokya kasasiro, Mulago erina enkola ennambulukufu ey'okukwatamu kasasiro.
mt0: With three incinerators, Mulago boasts an organised and elaborately systematic method of medical waste management.

en: Plastic bottles are recycled, domestic waste is collected by Kampala City Council and human body parts are taken to the mortuary grounds in Bukasa.
lug: Obucupa obwa pulasitiika buddamu okusaanuusibwa, kasasiro w'awaka akung'aanyizibwa Kampala Capital City Authority n'ebitundu by'emibiri gy'abantu bitwalibwa mu ggwanika e Bukasa.
mt0: Plastic bottles are recycled, waste from domestic households is collected by Kampala City Council and body parts are taken to the mortuary grounds in Bukasa.

en: But for the residents of Kifumbira Kamwokya, just two kilometres away, Mulago's organisation offers little comfort.
lug: Naye mu batuuze b'e Kifumbira Kamwokya, abawukanako kkiromita bbiri zokka, enteekateeka ya Mulago ebagumya kitono.
mt0: No reply to this question. But for the residents of Kifumbira Kamwokya, just two kilometres away, Mulago's organisation offers little comfort.

en: Used needles, syringes and blood transfusion tubes were dumped in Kifumbira, Kamwokya.
lug: Empiso ezikozeseddwa, ebbomba ezivaamu eddagala ly'empiso n'obupiira obuyisibwamu omusaayi byali bisuulibwa mu Kifumbira - Kamwokya.
mt0: Used needles, syringes and blood transfusion tubes were dumped in Kifumbira, Kamwokya.

en: Mulago Hospital has an incinerator.
lug: Mulago erina ekyuma omwokyebwa kasasiro.

en: The job in Uganda Clays was tailor-made for me.
lug: Omulimu mu Uganda Clays gwateekebwawo nga gwange.
mt0: Nkabaka Uganda Clays ndayikoze ndenge ndayikola.

en: It has been a challenging but exciting eighteen years I have spent here, first as company secretary for nine years and then CEO for nine years.
lug: Kubadde kusoomoozebwa ate nga kisanyusa nti emyaka kkumi na munaana gye mmaze wano, okusooka ng'omuwandiisi wa kampuni okumala emyaka mwenda n'emirala mwenda nga ssenkulu.
mt0: Ndiye ntango nzito lakini nzito zaidi ya miaka ishirini ambayo ndayitumia hapa, awali nikiwa msimamizi wa kampuni kwa miaka nĩ inyanya na nĩ nĩ mkuu wa kampuni kwa miaka nĩ inyanya.

en: So I am carrying good memories for the company, the employees, and the board, especially the chairman, Professor Ssenfuma.
lug: Nolwekyo nina ebujjukizo bya kampuni ebirungi, abakozi, n'olukiiko, naddala ssentebe, pulofeesa Ssenfuma.
mt0: Njagala nsinziro nziza mpona kampani, abolu, na board, hususan chairman, Professor Ssenfuma.

en: He has been my chairman since I became the chief executive officer in 2001.
lug: Abadde ssentebe wange okuva lwe nnafuuka ssenkulu w'ekitongole mu nkumi bbiri mu gumu.
mt0: Ndani alikuwa mwenyekiti wangu tangu nikiwa mkuu wa utawala wa shirika katika 2001.

en: According to the Independent issue of July 23-29, Housing finance bank last week listed its oversubscribed bond on the Uganda securities exchange.

en: MTN Uganda last week received its 5G network from Huawei Technologies of China.

en: MTN Chief Executive, Themba Khumalo said that they believe with such investments, Uganda will be among the fastest growing economies in Africa.

en: During its National Executive Conference in January, the NRM declared it had registered 8 million members including the under age.

en: But the day I told him I had tested HIV positive, he threw me out of the house, Nakasi narrates in a tone of courage that has defied many odds.

en: After the treatment, she and other women, who are victims of sexual violence, started a support group called Teso Peace Women's Activists.

mt0: Awakened after the treatment, she and other women who are victims of sexual violence, started a support group called Teso Peace Women's Activists.

en: According to the Independent issue of July 30-August 05, 2010, Rosebell Kagumi wrote about women and girls who are abandoned after rape.

mt0: Siku zote ukija kusema kwamba utamuona Simon Peter Ochieng, akasema kwamba alikuwa akatapokea barua yenye ilikuwa iitakaswa kusimama mbele ya commision ya disiplini.

en: He said Mao's group only summoned them through a press conference for publicity purposes.
lug: Yagamba nti ekibinja kya Mao kyabayita buyisi mu lukiiko lwa bannamawulire n'ekigendererwa ky'okumanyibwa.
mt0: Mao alisema kwamba timu yake ilikuwa ikawaita katika mkutano wa habari kwa ajili ya matangazo.

en: Ochieng said that Mao's group loves media attention.
lug: Ochieng yagamba nti ekibinja kya Mao kyagala nnyo amawulire.
mt0: Ochieng alisema kwamba Mao's group ipenda utambulisho wa media.

en: He said they pulled the same action on August 18 when they went to meet the Inter Party Corporation leaders and called journalists to escort them.
lug: Yagamba nti baakola ekintu kye kimu nga 18 Ogwomunaana bwe baagenda okusisinka omukago ogutaba ebibiina bye byobufuzi ne bayita bannamwawulire okubawerekererako.
mt0: N'agamba nti baakoze n'ekyo ntango baakende ku nkambi ya Inter Party Corporation na n'atuma bantu bamenyesha habari n'agamba nti baakoze n'ekyo ntango baakende ku nkambi ya Inter Party Corporation.

en: Salaam Musumba, approves that Mao's group went to meet the Inter Party Corporation for publicity purposes.
lug: Salaam Musumba, akakasa nti ekiwayi kya Mao kyagenda okusisinkana omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi n'ekigendererwa ky'okumanyika.
mt0: Salaam Musumba, akubali kwamba Mao's group yagenda kuonana na Inter Party Corporation kwa ajili ya matangazo.

en: Musumba described Mao's decision to meet Inter Party Corporation leaders as a childish check to attract publicity.
lug: Musumba yannyonnyola okusalowo kwa Mao okusisinkana abakulembeze b'omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi ng'ekyekito eky'okwagala okwogerwako.
mt0: Musumba alikuwa akiita Mao's decision to meet Inter Party Corporation leaders as a childish check to attract publicity.

en: The Mao group's sudden change of attitude was very surprising given that they have been publicly minimizing the Inter Party Corporation.
lug: Engeri ekiwayi kya Mao okwekyusa mbagirawo kyali kyewuunyisa olw'okuba nti kyali kyagala nnyo amawulire g'omukago ogutaba ebibiina bye byobufuzi.
mt0: Mao group's sudden change of attitude was very surprising given that they have been publicly minimizing the Inter Party Corporation.

en: Musumba said they were not interested in spoiling in childish politics.
lug: Musumba yagamba nti tebaali beetegefu kumala biseera mu byabufuzi bya kito.
mt0: Musumba alisema kwamba alikuwa asiye na nia ya kuharibika katika siasa za utoto.

en: She said the Inter Party Corporation had written to the Mao group to join Inter Party Corporation but they refused.
lug: Yagamba nti omukago ogutaba ebibiina by'ebyobufuzi gwali gwawandiikira ekiwayi kya Mao okugwegattako naye nga kyagaana.
mt0: Agamba nti Inter Party Corporation yandika ku Mao group y'amagezi ya Inter Party Corporation naye n'akataa.

en: They later decided to examine the legal and political implications of accepting one faction of Democratic Party when the other is out.

mt0: They later decided to examine the legal and political implications of accepting one faction of the Democratic Party when the other is out.

en: The Inter Party Corporation then subjected the issue to a legal and political survey.

en: But the Lubega faction is looking at admission into the Inter Party Corporation rather than reconcile with the Mao group.

en: In an interview with Lubega before Mbale conference early this year, his position on joining Inter Party Corporation was the same as Mao's.

en: The Democratic Party would not join the Inter party Cooperation because the party always lost their members in such unions.

en: Observers say he was one sided to take his Democratic Party camp into the 2011 elections without the backing of other opposition parties.

en: They were also facing a lot of pressure from the Mao group.

en: They claimed that the NRM 2006 party primaries had been rigged and decided to contest the general elections as independent candidates.

en: He claimed that after Bichisha arrived in South Africa, he was called on the telephone by someone claiming to be Doctor Ndahiro.

en: First, on the day he was shot, the deputy president of South Africa showed up at the hospital where Kayumba had been admitted.
lug: Okusookera ddala, ku lunaku lwe yakubwa amasasi, amyuka Pulezidenti wa South Africa yalabikako mu ddwaliro Kayumba gye yali aweereddwa ekitanda.
mt0: First, on the day he was shot, the deputy president of South Africa showed up at the hospital where Kayumba had been admitted.

en: He was joined by South Africa's former chief spy, Bill Masetera, a close friend of Patrick Karegyeya also a dissident with Kayumba.
lug: Yeegattibwako eyali akulira bambega e South Africa, Bill Masetera mukwano ennyo gwa Patrick Karegyeya bwe bali ennyo ku mbiranye ne Kayumba.
mt0: Alikuwa na Bill Masetera, ndugu mmoja wa Patrick Karegyeya, ndugu mmoja wa Kayumba.

en: Masetera was the head of South Africa's National Intelligence Agency when Karegyeya was Rwanda's director of External Security.
lug: Masetera ye yali akulira ekitongole ekikessi mu South Africa Karegyeya gye yali akulira ebyokwerinda wabweru wa South Africa.
mt0: Masetera n'aliko mukuru wa shirikari ya usalama ya nsi ya Afrika ya Kaskazini ntango Karegyeya n'aliko mukuru wa shirikari ya usalama wa Rwanda.

en: Masetera later became a security advisor to former South African president, Thabo Mbeki.
lug: Masetera oluvannyuma yafuuka omuwabuzi ku byokwerinda ow'eyaliko pulezidenti wa South Africa, Thabo Mbeki.
mt0: Masetera ntango y'oluvannyuma n'ayambaga n'amagambo ya usalama kwa n'omurongo wa mbere wa Afrika ya Sudi, Thabo Mbeki.

en: The two fell out over allegations that Masetera was secretly enhancing the power of Mbeki's main rival and current president, Jacob Zuma.
lug: Ababiri baalemagana oluvannyuma lw'ebigambibwa nti Masetera nti yali ayongedde amaanyi mu mulabe wa Mbeki asingayo era Pulezidenti aliko, Jacob Zuma.
mt0: Mbeki na Masetera bakangana n'amagambo nti Masetera alikuwa akiongeza uwezo wa Mbeki's ndugu na mkuu wa serikali Jacob Zuma.

en: Masetera's relationship with Karegyeya became stronger as, he now claims, presidents tend to use and dump their intelligence chiefs.
lug: Enkolagana ya Masetera ne Karegyeya yeeyongera nga bw'agamba kati, nti bapulezidenti batera okukozesa abakulira obukessi ate bwe bamala ne babasuulawo.
mt0: Masetera's relationship with Karegyeya became stronger as, he now claims, presidents tend to use and dump their intelligence chiefs.

en: The Independent of July 2010 reports that the deceased ADF family members are not getting support and yet their husbands died while on state duty.
